<h1 class="sectionedit1" style="font-weight: bold; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.2; clear: left; font-size: 2em; margin: 0px 0px 0.444em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">第一种方法，在命名空间（指定目录）建立知识</h1><p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.4em; padding: 0px;"><img src="/dokuwiki/ueditor/php/upload/image/20171214/1513236535679471.png" title="1513236535679471.png" alt="图片.png"/></p><h2 class="sectionedit2" style="font-weight: bold; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.2; clear: left; font-size: 1.5em; margin: 0px 0px 0.666em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">第二种方法，通过查询新建知识</h2><p style="margin: 0px 0px 1.4em; padding: 0px;"><a href="http://119.23.57.31:8885/test/doku/_detail/imagepaste;2a0a240d06c0af1384ee4017464a4d30.png?id=doku%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E8%AF%B4%E6%98%8E%3A%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E5%85%A5%E9%97%A8%E8%AF%B4%E6%98%8E%3A%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%96%B0%E5%BB%BA%E7%9F%A5%E8%AF%86" class="media" title="imagepaste:2a0a240d06c0af1384ee4017464a4d30.png" style="outline: none; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(43, 115, 183);"><img src="/dokuwiki/ueditor/php/upload/image/20171214/1513236545478513.png" title="1513236545478513.png" alt="图片.png"/></a></p><p><br/></p>
